name: DEMO (takateru)
description:
made this over like a month idk kinda done as a love letter or my own spin of one of those late 00s or early 10s j-horror/puzzle RPG maker games like Ao Oni, Ib, Witch's House, etc. 

you play as Yume, a young girl who wakes up in a school, abandoned and must find all the digits to the code that is locking the front gate.

(make sure to read the "Read Me Before Playing.txt" before playing)
